title: Eric's Trip Discography and rarities
description:
In celebration of the upcoming Eric&#039;s Trip reunion gigs in Canada & Seattle, I&#039;m
sharing my Eric&#039;s Trip music collection including all studio albums, 7"s, indie cassettes and various live shows and radio sessions. Enjoy! If there&#039;s sufficient interest, I can share some rarities from Elevator/Moonsocket/Orange Glass etc.
 <a href="
http://www.subpop.com/channel/news/sp20_festival_details" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.subpop.com/channel/news/sp20_festival_details</a>

[Note there&#039;s some duplication here, but most are differently sourced. Sorry to anyone looking for better lineage]

Studio Albums
=============

* Love Tara (Sub Pop) ? 1993 
* Forever Again (Sub Pop) ? 1994 
* Purple Blue (Sub Pop) ? 1996 
* Long Days Ride &#039;Till Tomorrow (Sappy Records) ? 1997 
* The Eric&#039;s Trip Show live CD (Teenage USA) ? 2001 
* Live in Concert November 4th, 2001 live CD (Great Beyond) ? 2001 
* The 1st album [remastered] (Great Beyond) - 2002

EPs
===

* Eric&#039;s Trip EP cassette (Independent) ? 1990 
* Catapillars EP cassette (Independent) ? 1991 
* Drowning EP cassette (Independent) ? 1991 
* Warm Girl EP demo cassette (Independent) ? 1992 
* Belong 7" EP (NIM) ? 1992 
* Peter EP (Murderecords) ? 1993 
* Songs About Chris 7" EP (4 songs) / CD5 (6 songs) (Sub Pop) ? 1993 
* Julie and the Porthole to Dimentia 7" EP (One solo track by each of the four 

members) (Sappy Records) ? 1993 (Also released as Steroe Mountain 7")
* Warm Girl 7" EP (Derivative) ? 1993 
* The Gordon Street Haunting 7" EP / CD5 (Sub Pop) ? 1994 
* The Road South 7" EP (Sonic Unyon) ? 1995 
[Missing Trapped in New York EP, which I haven&#039;t yet ripped from vinyl]

Splits
======
* Nevermind the Mollucs (split /w Sloan) (both 7" and CD)


Radio
=====
* Eric&#039;s Trip on Montreal radio music/interview (1991)
* Peel Sessions (1992)
* Eric&#039;s Trip on Moncton radio interview (January 1995)
* Eric&#039;s Trip on radio interview (March 1993)

Videos
======
* My Room
* Stove
* Sun SOming Up
* Viewmaster

04/06/95 - Halifax, Nova Scotia
